# description

**Instance Property**

A string that represents the contents of the set.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing a Set

- **hash(into:)**: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.
- **debugDescription**: A string that represents the contents of the set, suitable for debugging.
- **customMirror**: A mirror that reflects the set.
